Class NgramTrieBitarr

extends java.lang.Object
    Byte array that keeps ngram trie

    • Method Detail

      • getArr

        public byte[] getArr()
        Getter for byte array, so it can be filled with actual data
        Returns:
        data array

      • readInt

        public int readInt(int memPtr,
                   int bitOffset,
                   int mask)
        Reads integer from byte array for specified memory pointer, offset from this pointer and mask of value that is read.
        Parameters:
        memPtr - - memory pointer for specific ngram order
        bitOffset - - offset from memPtr that is calculated according to ngram index and type of value that is read.
        mask - - bit mask of value that is read
        Returns:
        requested integer

      • readNegativeFloat

        public float readNegativeFloat(int memPtr,
                               int bitOffset)
        Reads negative float from byte array for specified memory pointer and offset from this pointer. Used to read uncompressed float, i.e. in case quantation was not applied
        Parameters:
        memPtr - - memory pointer for specific ngram order
        bitOffset - - offset from memPtr
        Returns:
        float that was read from specified position

      • readFloat

        public float readFloat(int memPtr,
                       int bitOffset)
        Reads float from byte array for specified memory pointer and offset from this pointer. Used to read uncompressed float, i.e. in case quantation was not applied
        Parameters:
        memPtr - - memory pointer for specific ngram order
        bitOffset - - offset from memPtr
        Returns:
        float that was read from specified position
